Reviews.Title: Dont Buy
Reviews.Author: Katerinka70
Reviews.Content: Honestly the worst device ever, no Tech support, crashing all the time, not new- refurbished, I had so much problems with software.The battery is good for 30 minutes, then need to buy new one. The Wi-Fi distance when it works is about 6 feet max.The box arrived opened, the power USB does not work at all.Maybe I forgot something.... But the real price of this is about 15 dollars, not more.

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money on this unit.
Reviews.Author: MrTech
Reviews.Content: The one and only benefit of this cam is that it is small.  The fun stops there.  The biggest issue is that the battery lasts about 30 minutes, then you have to buy new.  I hacked mine into a robot rover which uses 2x 18650 batteries, which now gives it the power it needs.  Pic quality is not great, plastic is cheap.  Not easy to configure either.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE!!
Reviews.Author: heenalu5
Reviews.Content: This product was sold as new, but it looked like it had been opened. It didn't come with an English manual either. The seller sent me a link and I'm supposed to take my time paper and ink to print it out. Even still, the manual makes no sense. I can't use it with my computer or phone. And now the seller is not responding to my requests for a return. Save yourself a lot of headache and avoid this camera and seller.

Reviews.Title: Wow.. What a peice of crap!
Reviews.Author: J.R.
Reviews.Content: First off I would like to say that this unit should be discontinued all together because of the lack of quality control. I opened up the box moments after the postman delivered it and tested the signal strength and found it loses signal completely after 6' or less without any interference or obstacles to affect it. After messing with it for a few weeks, trying to set it up on my existing wireless network wich requires an update, I found out this seller has sold  me an old or refurbished unit with a outdated, non updatable firmware for double what the manufacturer sells a new one with up to date firmware for. Im not sure if the firmware update adresses the range and lack of being able to connect to an existing network or not. If you are adement about having one of these units I would suggest purchasing straight from the manufacturer's website. go to  thumbdrive . com

Reviews.Title: Virus
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Kelley
Reviews.Content: I got a virus on my computer from the software that you download to support the device.Don't buy this its not worth the hassle

Reviews.Title: Wrong pieces
Reviews.Author: stephanie
Reviews.Content: I did not like this product. I could not even get it to work for the pieces were wrong, and the battery would not fit no matter how you tried. Some pieces missing.

Reviews.Title: Works well, Takes a bit of time to boot, too bad it doesn't also function as a web cam
Reviews.Author: Brandon N. Wirtz "CTO of Stremor"
Reviews.Content: It works well quality is not bad. Would have been nice if the battery was rechargable, and if you could hard wire to the USB and use as a regular web cam, but it works well enough.
